00021 #ifndef TRIQS_UTILITY_PARAMS_H
00022 #define TRIQS_UTILITY_PARAMS_H
00023 #include "./opaque_object_h5.hpp"
00024 #include "./defaults.hpp"
00025 namespace triqs { namespace utility {
00036  class parameters {
00037   public :
00038    parameters() {};
00039    parameters (parameters const & other) = default;
00040    parameters (parameters && other) noexcept { swap(*this,other);}
00041    parameters & operator =  (parameters const & other)  = default;
00042    parameters & operator =  (parameters && other) noexcept { swap(*this,other); return *this;}
00043    friend void swap(parameters & a, parameters &b) noexcept { swap(a.object_map,b.object_map);} 
00044 
00045   private:
00046    typedef std::map<std::string, _object> map_t;
00047    map_t object_map;
00048    std::map<std::string, std::string> documentation;
00049 
00050    friend class boost::serialization::access;
00051    template<class Archive>
00052     void serialize(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version) { ar & TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("object_map",object_map); }
00053 
00054   public:
00055 
00056    typedef map_t::const_iterator const_iterator;
00057    typedef map_t::iterator iterator;
00058    const_iterator begin() const { return object_map.begin();}
00059    const_iterator end()  const { return object_map.end();}
00060    iterator begin() { return object_map.begin();}
00061    iterator end() { return object_map.end();}
00062 
00063    bool has_key(std::string const & k) const { return object_map.find(k) != object_map.end();}
00064 
00066    _object & operator[](std::string const & key) { 
00067      //std::cout << key << std::endl << std::flush;
00068      auto & r = object_map[key];
00069      if (r.name()=="") r.set_name(key); // in case the object has just been created, set its name
00070      return r;
00071    }
00072 
00074    _object const & operator[](std::string const & key) const {
00075     auto it = object_map.find(key);
00076     if ( it== object_map.end()) TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR<<"Parameters : the key : "<< key<< " does not exists";
00077     return it->second;
00078    }
00079 
00080    friend std::string get_triqs_hdf5_data_scheme(parameters const&) { return "";}
00081    
00083    friend void h5_write ( h5::group F, std::string const & subgroup_name, parameters const & p){
00084     auto gr = F.create_group(subgroup_name);
00085     for (auto & pvp : p.object_map) h5_write(gr, pvp.first, pvp.second);
00086    }
00087 
00089    friend void h5_read ( h5::group F, std::string const & subgroup_name, parameters & p);
00090 
00091    friend std::ostream & operator << (std::ostream & out, parameters const & p) {
00092     out<< "{";
00093     for (auto & pvp : p.object_map) out<< pvp.first << " : " << pvp.second<< ", ";
00094     return out<<"}";
00095    }
00096 
00102    template<typename T> static void register_type() { _object::register_type<T>::invoke();}
00103 
00109    void update(parameters const & pdef);
00110 
00112    //static constexpr ull_t strict_type_check = 1ull;              // Type check is strict. Always true now
00113    static constexpr ull_t reject_key_without_default = 1ull<<2;
00114 
00122    void update(parameter_defaults const & pdef, ull_t flag =0);
00123 
00124  };
00125 
00126 }}
00127 #endif
